alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Leavenworth; Wyandotte (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued May 08 at 1:02AM CDT until May 08 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 201 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 5 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN KANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL KANSAS JOHNSON KS IN NORTHEAST KANSAS LEAVENWORTH WYANDOTTE IN MISSOURI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 22 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MISSOURI HOWARD SALINE IN NORTH CENTRAL MISSOURI CALDWELL CARROLL CHARITON DAVIESS GRUNDY LINN MO LIVINGSTON MACON RANDOLPH SULLIVAN IN NORTHEAST MISSOURI ADAIR SCHUYLER IN NORTHWEST MISSOURI BUCHANAN CLINTON DEKALB IN WEST CENTRAL MISSOURI CLAY JACKSON LAFAYETTE PLATTE RAY THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF BRAYMER, BRECKENRIDGE, BROOKFIELD, BRUNSWICK, CAMERON, CARROLLTON, CHILLICOTHE, CLARKSDALE, CONCORDIA, DOWNING, EXCELSIOR SPRINGS, FAYETTE, FORT LEAVENWORTH, GALLATIN, GLADSTONE, GLASGOW, GLENWOOD, GREEN CITY, GREENTOP, HAMILTON, HIGGINSVILLE, INDEPENDENCE, JAMESPORT, KANSAS CITY, KANSAS CITY KANSAS, KEARNEY, KEYTESVILLE, KIRKSVILLE, LA PLATA, LANCASTER, LANSING, LATHROP, LAWSON, LEAVENWORTH, LENEXA, LEXINGTON, LIBERTY, MACON, MARCELINE, MARSHALL, MAYSVILLE, MILAN, MOBERLY, NEW FRANKLIN, ODESSA, OLATHE, OSBORN, OVERLAND PARK, PARKVILLE, PLATTE CITY, PLATTSBURG, POLO, QUEEN CITY, RICHMOND, RIVERSIDE, SALISBURY, SHAWNEE, ST. JOSEPH, ST. JOSEPH AIRPORT, STANLEY, STEWARTSVILLE, TRENTON, UNION STAR, WEATHERBY LAKE, AND WESTON.
